title: Leaf from album "Three Friends of Winter"
description: branch of plum blossoms in inverted \"U\" shape; two sets of calligraphy in differed hands; R side has four columns with rectangular red chop at top R and two square red chops below last column; L side has two columns of calligraphy with two red cops at end of calligraphy; two larger square chops at bottom corners
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
